Header.nativeAppBeforeLogin.Content: Maverick requires you to install the app before placing any bets.
Footer.info: If you or someone you know has a gambling problem? CALL 1-800-522-4700
Footer.responsible: Must be 21+ and located in Colorado to bet. Play Maverick Sports™ is operated by Grand Z Casino Operator, LLC, based in Colorado, USA and is regulated by the Colorado Department of Revenue, Enforcement Division – Gaming. Please play responsibly. If you or someone you know has a problem with gambling, call 1-800-GAMBLER (1-800-426-8537). Assistance is also available by calling or texting 1-800-522-4700, chatting online via http://www.ncpgambling.org/help-treatment/chat or visiting the National Council on Problem Gambling Services website at http://www.ncpgambling.org/. Information, resources, counseling and referral services can be accessed 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Visit our responsible Gaming page to learn more

nativeApp.failedGeolocation.contect.CO: We have detected you are trying to place a wager while located outside the state of Colorado where wagering is permitted.
nativeApp.failedGeolocation.contect2.CO: If you think you are seeing this message in error, please log out of and close the Maverick app. Try Again. If you have any questions, please contact us at playmavericksports@maverickgaming.com.

Transaction.Sightline.Enroll.Note5:
• Enroll in Play Maverick Sports Play+
  • Fund with your Credit or Debit Card, Pay With My Bank, or PayPal
  • Fast Deposits and Cash-Outs
  • Receive your physical Play Maverick Sports Play+ prepaid card in as little as 10-14 days
  • Use everywhere Discover® is accepted
  • In order to wager, you must transfer funds from your Play+ account to your Maverick account
Transaction.Sightline.Funding.Title: Fund your Maverick Play+ account
Transaction.Sightline.SB.Info: In order to wager, you must transfer funds from your Play+ account to your Maverick account.
Transaction.Sightline.Funding.Note1:
• Step 1: Click Fund Play+ to add funds to your Play+ account with a Credit or Debit Card, Pay With My Bank, or PayPal.
  • Step 2: Transfer from Play+ to Maverick by clicking Deposit in the Cashier.
